name: The Legendary Miss Mahogany
description:
Help the Legendary Miss Mahogany

Defeat the Skeleton Army!

Controls:
Arrow Keys = Move Around 
Spacebar = Jump /DoubleJump 
1 Key = Sword Attack 
Esc Key = Pause Menu 

Helps:
Red Potions = Restore Health
Yellow Potions = Speed Boost
You need a Key to open the Gate!
A larger Enemy may have it!
Press Enter key to Open the Gate! (Only if you have the Key1st!)

Made By Elijah Leon

Unity Assets Used:
BitGem Skeleton/Skeleton King/Skeleton Swordsman Smashy Craft
BitGem Elf/Volleyball Girls Smashy Craft
BitGem Cube World Coins
RedBee 2.5D Platformer Kit
GamesPlus James Easy Menu

Font Used: Triforce / https://zeldauniverse.net/media/fonts/
